API Reference

Welcome to the API reference for private-pgm. This section provides detailed documentation for all the modules, classes, and functions available in the mbi package.

Quick Module Overview

  • dataset: Handles data loading and representation.

  • domain: Manages attribute information (types, values, ranges).

  • factor: Defines and manipulates factors in graphical models.

  • graphical_model: Core classes for representing and working with PGMs.

  • estimation: Parameter estimation techniques.

  • marginal_oracles: Oracles for querying marginal distributions.

  • (Add brief descriptions for other key modules)

For details on specific classes or functions, please navigate to the respective module page.
